header.rec_loc: In a car driving from Cambridge to London
header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Cambridge, houses, plans for the future, thesis, university, Oxford, family, living arrangements
header.activity: Mother and son talking about the future during a drive between Cambridge and London
